documents.document: NEWS FLASH: popcorn-flavored Tic-Tacs taste as crap as you imagine.

well played, Senator Murray

It's interesting how many people contact me about applying for a PhD and don't spell my name right.
@visualosmosis <3 thank you so much for coming!
Crusty old Berliners are great when they're in a good mood. Also when they're in a bad mood, if you're not the target of their ireâ€¦
@cerpintor if it is, I started it.
Welp, now I know what happens when you forget to pick up your luggage from Baggage Claim. Gonna be here a while.
Holy shit. Was just re-reading Ngai's _Ugly Feelings_ on the plane; had one of those conceptual breakthroughs I used 2 have in grad school
@blackmadonnachi now that is a good interview.
@cerpintor You'll be tickled to hear that I did end up sprinting across the airport in my woolen coat and a cashmere sweater.
The Black Madonna, interviewed in The Quietus: https://t.co/UYtUK0FZfF
@emilynussbaum @Will_Lynch â€¦culminating in approx 30 minutes of panicked productivity.
I got a flight to catch so I ain't mad that this Uber driver is going so fast, but I'm a bit scared.
@cerpintor 100m Formalwear Sprint
Ah yes, now would be the perfect time for all trains to Birmingham Intl Airport to stop.
Successfully taught a seminar on no sleep. I guess all those years of raving finally paid off. @blackmadonnachi
@blackmadonnachi love u bae. Praying to TBM and hoping for her/your power.
Welp, it's been a while since I've pulled an all-nighter, but at least the marking is done. Off to prep my 9am class!
Finally found a diss track that I had been trying to ID for agesâ€¦ https://t.co/Q0InEHmmfS (NSFW AF, MF)
My "Up Late Marking Overdue Essays" soundtrack: https://t.co/SvPQeKgVmU @djshiva
DON'T FORGET: Two years till midterm elections.
TFW you dress up nice for work and then sprint two blocks in a woolen coat to catch the bus and now you're sweaty and gross but still formal
@kate_galloway yeah, the challenge for me is that the deadlines that I 'can't miss' are always admin/teaching, not research.
The usage of 'progress' as a transitive verb is kinda terrible.
That special paralysis when you have so many upcoming deadlines that you won't meet anything and you don't know where to start.
JFC Harborne High Street at rush hour is the absolute worst.
@datageneral @womensmarch note the rally cutting mic's to keep people on sched: applied 2 trans POC speakers but not Michael Moore.
@fabianholt yay! Glad this is out in print. I have to change some of the readings for my Music Festivals course as a result...
@blackmadonnachi <3 u, you boss-ass bitch.
@blackmadonnachi this is the best. <3
SHUT UP EVERYBODY, ANGELA DAVIS IS TALKING. #WomensMarchOnWashington
Janelle Monae is a gift none of us deserve.
"FEM THE FUTURE!" - Janelle Monae #WomensMarchOnWashington
"AquÃ­ estamos y no nos vamos!" / "We're here and we're not going away!" #WomensMarchOnWashington
"Si no nos dejan soÃ±ar, no los dejamos dormir!" / "if they don't let us dream, we won't let them sleep!" #WomensMarchOnWashington
Watching the live feed of women's march on Washington and feeling lifted. Sophie Cruz is the absolute best. Solidaridad!
On our way to the Women's March in Berlin. Anybody else going?
@DrCanonic @soundstudies there's a surprise....
Want to suppress your appetite and lose weight? Think about how often the seats in buses and trains are cleaned.
@whiteley_rose plz make this happen
ugh, I can tell within 1-3 sips if a coffee is going to give me a headache. #overExtractedAbomination
We offer 'distance learning' degrees, but whenever I see the abbreviation 'DL' I think 'downlow', e.g., 'Down-Low PhD in Music'.
My classmates and I were repeatedly told not to submit an unedited PhD diss. to publishers, but it's amazing how many I see published.
'Yay, snow!', says the person working from home today.
Protip: it is possible to eat too much Sichuan chili oil. #unforeseenConsequences
Yes! Just replenished my stock of 'angry lady' chili oil. It's flavor-time.
The British 'Cheers, thanks' system of passive-aggressive work-delegation is a thing of wonder.
I'm always a bit disappointed that Poundland is a cheap shop and not a swinger's club / gay sauna.
@MagicRealismBot not so much magical as entirely envisageable, this one...
Cracking up watching this BBC reporter standing on Chicago's Navy Pier trying to maintain composure in winter wind.
I am astounded by my own relentless optimism that my workload will abate sometime in the future.
On my way to the office and fighting the urge to run home and crawl back into bed. #notTheRealnessIordered
@blackmadonnachi @united that is appalling.
@inthegapbetween only if it's wee!
Relevant to many folks I know : White Nationalism and the Ethics of Medieval Studies https://t.co/0yOJghz3lE
Just discovering simpsonswave videos now. Afterparty fodder for days: https://t.co/QUREwE4JXB
@yukoasanuma can't wait!
Quoted from MetaFilter: 'Can we wrap Billie Lourd and Gary Fisher in bubble wrap, just to be safe?'
Home! But not before one final indignity: followed around the .@marksandspencer at B'ham New Street like a thief, buying milk & sandwich.
Ok, at least my luggage showed up when I landed in Manchester. Now, to find a train to Brum and steal a few hours of sleep b4 Berlin.
@pmgentry Solidarity. I just tried to do Toronto - Frankfurt - Birmingham and ended up in Manchester and nearly 10 hours late.
You know what this airport restaurant needs? An overexcited 5-year-old throwing tantrums and stealing the toys of other children.
It's appalling how little of the seating in the int'l terminal is non-paying.
The fuckery is strong at YYZ / Pearson tonight.
The .@AirCanada brand is deteriorating. What good are ML lounge passes that are invalid nearly everywhere? What 'loyalty reward' is this?
The first rule of Ryanair is never fly Ryanair.
I cannot wait to return to my sister's apartment and drown in cat hair.
Sister, holding a stray post-it note: This is garbage, right? Me: EVERYTHING IS GARBAGE.
In this day and age, any hotel that does not offer free WiFi does not merit the mention 'luxury' or 'all-inclusive'.
Tropical resorts are full of young couples who seem to think that nobody can tell they're getting each other off in the pool.
Do I know any ethnomusicologists of tourism in Mexico, especially specialising in Quintana Roo & the Mayan Peninsula?
@datageneral a few moments earlier, I saw some cloaca-on-cloaca action between some macaws. And the butterfly sanctuary was lit af.
There are ducks in *%#$ing trees here. https://t.co/XomElI4vBB
Breakfast of champions https://t.co/a5HRIor36F
@doctaj no, alas, but I am very interested in hearing what you find.
@AirCanada it's quite simple: 'Guest Pass' vouchers aren't valid for int'l ML lounges, but I'm an expat and int'l flights are all I do.
@AirCanada , you continue to make it harder for Aeroplan members to actually use the Maple Leaf lounges. The AC brand is eroding...
In UK HE, the long tail of Taylorism is wound tightly around our ankles.
@djshiva @blackmadonnachi Twang Factor: 10
Today's earworms, on repeat: Chopin Ballade in G; D. Parton's "Jolene"; Krakatau's "Egrang Funk". (Blame @blackmadonnachi for 1 of these.)
@blackmadonnachi Yes, yes, yes. It ain't like you didn't work hard for it. XOXO
Sleepless in Marylebone station: this hot chocolate better fix everything that is wrong with me.
TFW TF isn't enough.
Landed in Brum (late) and on my way home to spend the night preparing for tomorrow's lectures. Wheeeee.
Oh lord help me, I'm about to share this flight back to Birmingham with a Brummie school group.
@blackmadonnachi Pal Joey's "Party Time" is still one of those tracks I'd happily listen to on repeat forever: https://t.co/g7Q7u2vf6n
@konratz no worries, Konratzchen! I understand completely. There'll be other opportunities. LG
Someone needs to write a melodrama / opera re: that moment when you're looking forward to the first sip of coffee but it's TERRIBLE. #agony
My apologies to the student whose midterm essay now smells of Malaysian 'belacan kangkung'. It was delicious. #noRegrets #noBreak
As a Ted Chiang fan, Arrival was very satisfying. I just hope there's a director's cut with more language nerdery.
@cerpintor there are some instructional videos out on the interwebs. Just turn off SafeSearch.
OMG Cards Against Colonialism. Just in time for Yearly Gift Season: https://t.co/vYbwlUgjKa
@LMGM HigherEd exploits this: I can't let my students or colleagues down; if I neglect my research, I only harm myself. (2/2)
